channel.title: Week 7
channel.description: Week 7 Objectives: Practice labs on deploying applications to AWS Translate blog posts Tasks to be carried out this week: Day Task Start Date Completion Date Reference Material 2 - Editing the automatic notification API for the final project 20/10/2025 20/10/2025 3 - Practice: lab15: Deploying applications on Docker with AWS 21/10/2025 21/10/2025 https://000015.awsstudygroup.com/vi/ 4 - Translating blog posts: Continuous deployment based on GitOps methodology with ArgoCD and EKS using natural language 22/10/2025 22/10/2025 Blog 6 5 - Translated blogs: Introducing Strands Agents 1.0: Simplifying Multi-Agent Orchestration Ready for Deployment 23/10/2025 23/10/2025 Blog 7 6 - Practice: lab58: Working with Amazon System Manager - Session Manager 24/10/2025 24/10/2025 https://000058.awsstudygroup.com/vi/ Week 7 Achievements: Practice lab to create image and deploy application with docker
